newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Foreigners bid 500 bln rbls for Russia T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners bid 500 bln rbls for Russia T-bills.

text.p: Bids by non-residents at Wednesday's two auctions of Russian Treasury bills totalled 500 billion roubles, a central bank official said.

A total of 11.5 trillion roubles was on offer. Non-residents were allowed to buy up to 10 percent of the four trillion roubles of three-month bills being auctioned and up to 35 percent of the 7.5 trillion roubles of six-month bills on offer.
Bids for the three-month bills totalled 6.11 trillion roubles nominal, with the finance ministry accepting 3.23 trillion nominal.
Results of the auction of six-month bills have not yet been released.
Wednesday's auctions were the first open to non-residents since the central bank widened access to the government securities market for foreigners on August 15.
